abstract: The Internet giant is buying the travel guide maker from John Wiley & Sons to expand its local and travel search results.
snippet: The Internet giant is buying the travel guide maker from John Wiley & Sons to expand its local and travel search results.
lead_paragraph: 8:56 p.m. | Updated SAN FRANCISCO — Google made another foray into producing original content Monday when it announced its plans to buy the Frommer’s brand of travel guides from John Wiley & Sons to augment its local and travel search results.

headline.main: Google Plans to Buy Frommer’s Travel Guides
headline.print_headline: Google Says It Will Buy Frommer’s For Content
